website_summaries.verdict: The Lomography Konstruktor is an all-plastic 35mm SLR camera that you build yourself, but once you've put it together it's a bit frustrating to use.

customer_reviews.title: A good activity for all ages ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a very good way to learn how cameras are constructed. The parts are small and using a white, or light coloured tray/ mat will help see all items more easily. Good choice of colours for individual taste to personal camera style.
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: The shutter won't close rendering the camera completely useless! Lomography do some nice cameras but I've found ...
customer_reviews.text: Spent hours assembling, then disassembled, reassembled and disassembled again. It seems I was unlucky. The light chamber with my kit is broken. The shutter won't close rendering the camera completely useless! Lomography do some nice cameras but I've found there's always a slight risk in buying one online. Several years ago I had to buy a two Diana Minis as the first just jammed the film all the time.
customer_reviews.author: K. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Fun to build
customer_reviews.text: My son loved building this but it does have TINY components and the sticky protector on the mirror left lots of gunk when removed that was hard to clean off. Not used yet so not sure what the picture quality is like.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cameras for students
customer_reviews.text: We have been constructing these cameras in a photography class. Some bits are a little fiddly, but the end product seems very solid and they seem to work (if only students would stop opening the back!) A great way to teach the parts of a camera.
customer_reviews.author: squalf

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: It is funning! I spent two hours to complete it, and i feel so happy! It is the best toy for a man. I have been used canon 80d a long time, but this film camera may bring me more happy! I love it
customer_reviews.author: konakula2

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a friends birthday so can't comment on the product beyond I had a sneaky pic in the box and it looked great. I wish someone would buy it for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy BB

customer_reviews.title: Great present
customer_reviews.text: Present which is perfect for Nanny and grandchildren to make together
customer_reviews.author: Sarah L Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic, well made
customer_reviews.text: Daughter asked for camera kit, so she got one Ha Ha ... Fantastic, well made, used for "arty, retro photos"
customer_reviews.author: tom63

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Boyfriend loved it, occupied him for ages making it and loves using it
customer_reviews.author: bsears182

customer_reviews.title: A bit of a novelty
customer_reviews.text: Build you own! Like the concept and this is at reasonable price. My son comments that the focus ring is a bit stiff, otherwise, it seems OK and looks cool as it is very different from any off the shelf camera you can buy.
customer_reviews.author: Rock'n Roller

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic present
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant product. Was a present for my partner for his birthday and he loved it. Took a little longer then 2 hours to build but he has had a blast making and using it.
customer_reviews.author: ElPodlo

customer_reviews.title: Not happy at all
customer_reviews.text: Tried it as a novelty. Very flimsy, no clear instructions to build, and faulty mechanical parts. It became pretty much useless after two uses.
customer_reviews.author: SK-from-MK

customer_reviews.title: This is not the Super Kit.
customer_reviews.text: I have the same complaint as the other reviewer - the item I received was the basic and not super kit. I will be returning the item for this reason. You would think they would amend the listing given that this has happened twice within six months.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was great product or really works well and the keen photographer was very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: jane higgins

customer_reviews.title: interesting
customer_reviews.text: It took me 3-4 hours to build, but it is really nice. Have a great fun to complete it.
customer_reviews.author: wh7

customer_reviews.title: This was NOT the super kit. I was sent the basic kit but ...
customer_reviews.text: This was NOT the super kit. I was sent the basic kit but daughter was too excited to build it so we built it. Great kit but be aware this is not listed correctly or i was sent the wrong one.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Boyce

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 28 year old son as a Christmas present and he loved it. It gave hime something to do on Christmas day!!
customer_reviews.author: Bursar

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Highly recommend for people who enjoy photography. I bought this for my dad for christmas and he loved building it himself.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy Davies

customer_reviews.title: Challenging present
customer_reviews.text: My son was very pleased when he received this camera. It kept him occupied for a few hours to build, the tiny springs were a challenge. He enjoyed building it and now using it when he is out and about.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs T A Gibb

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas present for my partner who absolutely delighted
customer_reviews.author: Louise M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift
customer_reviews.text: Was a birthday present but my friend loved it and uses it regularly
customer_reviews.author: Liaqat Ali

customer_reviews.title: brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant present for family member they loved it, only took a couple of hours to assemble and he's had great fun using
customer_reviews.author: Sarah mcwilliams

customer_reviews.title: Great present for anybody new to photography who wants to ...
customer_reviews.text: Great present for anybody new to photography who wants to get to grips with how a camera works and get a working camera at the end of it.
customer_reviews.author: Janice M Scott

customer_reviews.title: A great gift for all 35mm film fans and arty to boot
customer_reviews.text: Well presented packaging and a great gift for any fan of 35mm film. The only thing worth bearing in mind is that it will almost certainly overlap frames, leak light and produce poor quality images, that being the selling point of the crazy world of Lomography! And ironically without them and their arty approach, 35mm film may have virtually disappeared altogether. Keep snapping.
customer_reviews.author: Clem Neville

customer_reviews.title: I love it when I saw it
customer_reviews.text: I love it when I saw it, but I bought it for a teenager and she didn't seem to love it. You need to put effort in building it!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Reinoso

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: exactly as described - wont see the final product until after christmas as its a present
customer_reviews.author: Sinead brogan

customer_reviews.title: Great packing, great item
customer_reviews.text: I got this item for a friend who is photography enthusiast. The item was very well packed in impressive and well thought box. Clean instructions were included and good piece quality, As expected this works as a camera. Dont expect anything great but you will get a better understanding on how film cameras work. Great for present.
customer_reviews.author: Ioannis

customer_reviews.title: Missing piece
customer_reviews.text: Missing piece in the set I received . Also ordered it one time and was refunded , bought it again as I really wanted to build it and when I started building it a small screw/ metal piece was missing so I can't complete it
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Lomography Konstructor kit.
customer_reviews.text: Took ages to build.Very fiddly to build (I'm used to building things but this was ridiculous).B setting doesn't work and film take up is erratic to put it mildly.
customer_reviews.author: mike millbank

customer_reviews.title: just okay
customer_reviews.text: it was a fun thing to build but on a practical level im finding it a bit hard to use
customer_reviews.author: brian1

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I followed the instructions to build this camera step by step and I could t get it to work! I then took the whole thing apart and started again still not result it didn't work for me
customer_reviews.author: Kala Louise hill

product_meta.title: Lomography Konstruktor F
product_meta.description: Lomography - Konstruktor DIY Kit with New Flash
feature_bullets: World's first 35mm plastic SLR, The fully rounded analogue experience - from construction to shooting, Simple to assemble, with excellent instructions, Interchangeable lens system, 35mm film format

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars123 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
